entries.title: Stable Diffusion in your pocket? “Draw Things” brings AI images to iPhone
entries.description: It's not fast, but it's free—and it runs locally on pocket-sized hardware.

entries.title: Reddit now lets you mute subreddits you don’t like
entries.description: The muting feature comes first to Android and iOS, later to desktop and the web.

entries.title: Measles outbreak erupts among unvaccinated children in Ohio daycare
entries.description: Officials reportedly expect that more cases will be identified.

entries.title: Spotify is the first to launch non-Google Android billing in the US
entries.description: Spotify is the first partner for Google Play's "User Choice Billing."

entries.title: A search bar is among the Task Manager improvements in new Windows 11 build
entries.description: New theme options and a better toggle for Efficiency mode are also in testing.

entries.title: Musk-fueled chaos at Twitter makes it hard to comply with FTC privacy order
entries.description: Musk's rapid product launches may run afoul of mandates from FTC privacy decree.

entries.title: Single Hubble image captured supernova at three different times
entries.description: An image taken in 2010 captured the lensed supernova, but nobody noticed.

entries.title: Still the best tablet-laptop: Microsoft’s Surface Pro 9 review
entries.description: The removal of the headphone jack is the only new thing that's wrong with it.

entries.title: Apple and Amazon colluded to raise iPhone and iPad prices, class action claims
entries.description: Lawsuit claims Amazon and Apple benefited from fewer vendors, higher prices.

entries.title: Twitter’s new leaders charged with helping Musk execute “dumb things”
entries.description: Twitter’s new guard will be charged with checking Musk’s worst instincts.

entries.title: Take that! Octopuses caught on camera vigorously throwing debris at each other
entries.description: It's the first time this kind of throwing behavior has been reported in octopuses.

entries.title: Modder makes an Apple M1-powered Wii for retro gaming
entries.description: Apple power meets Nintendo nostalgia.

entries.title: Google refunding three years of Stadia purchases starting this week
entries.description: Refunding years of purchases will be a logistics nightmare.

entries.title: Musk bans remote work at Twitter, warns staff of “dire” economic outlook
entries.description: Twitter staff must be in office 40 hours a week unless Musk approves exception.

entries.title: For $8, Twitter Blue users create a wave of checkmarked imposter accounts
entries.description: Most fake accounts are suspended quickly, but not before some brand damage is done.

entries.title: The best wireless mechanical keyboards
entries.description: Want mechanical typing without bulky cables? Here are our 4 favorite options.

entries.title: NASA leaves its Artemis I rocket exposed to winds above design limits
entries.description: NASA likely to begin inspections of the rocket and spacecraft later today.

entries.title: FTX on brink of collapse after Binance abandons rescue
entries.description: Crypto exchange dashes to fill $8 billion hole as investors write down equity.

entries.title: Lenovo patches secure boot vulnerabilities that imperil 25 notebook models
entries.description: Hackers can exploit vulnerabilities to install malicious firmware that survives reboots.

entries.title: Ancient wisdom: Oldest full sentence in first alphabet is about head lice
entries.description: "May this [ivory] tusk root out the lice of the hair and the beard."
